card.question: Software Life Cycle
card.answer: A process for planning, creating, testing and deploying an information system.

card.question: Software Quality (What are the attributes?)
card.answer:
An attribute of a product or process that, if improved, would better satisfy one or more of the stakeholders of that product or service.
Usability
Efficiency
Reliability
Maintainability
Reusability

card.question: Agile
card.answer:
Iterative software engineering philosophy that emphasizes the ability to quickly modify software (test-first development).
Gather requirements in small increments, and design and implement each small increment before the next.
May require design changes/refactoring along the way to accommodate new requirements.
